ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Digest Number 172
ygData.msgSnippet: well, I no longer play, so I don;t have a lot to talk about.  I stopped paying any attention for a while, and recently I have begun to read some eq news once
ygData.messageBody:
well, I no longer play, so I don;t have a lot to talk about. I stopped paying any attention for a while, and recently I have begun to read some eq news once in a while. Does anyone know what the deal is with Erudite SKs? Is this a new choice, and does anyone know how good they are?
Gugbug, retired TSK
level 12, Povar

> p.s.- Wake up this list! The only mail I have seen is stuff I have sent and
> replies to it.
>
> --
> Sabbat
> DE SK
> 1st Tier of Hate
